thread.section_title: Dresslink 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslink 的点评意见 | dresslink.com
thread.title: Lesley McKenzie
thread.title_full: Dresslink 的点评人 Lesley McKenzie

author: Lesley McKenzie
title: Lesley McKenzie
text: Although their customer service team respond the same day to your mail, this is the only "on time" thing about this company. Having ordered an item well over one month ago, I've still not received my item to even assess the quality. I have told them repeatedly in no longer need or want the item and have made multiple requests and demands for a refund but they appear unwilling to give me my money back. For reference my order number, #DLN619G0V.
